sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information 2">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:83844e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c7e8</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Biz Phone With Extension</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Business Number to the format: ### ###-#### ext. ###
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-#### ext. ###.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

    var formControlName = 'u_business_phone';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number followed by "ext." and 3 digit extension.';
		
   // Allows formats of ### ###-#### OR ### ###-#### ext ####
   //var phonenoPattern = /^(((\d{3})\s{1}?(\d{3})-{1}(\d{4}))((\s{1}ext\s{1}\d{4})?))$/;	
   var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})[-.]?(ext)?([0-9]{3})?$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';
        
		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6, 10);
		var extNumber = newValue.substring(10, 13);
		if (newValue.length == 10){
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		} else {
			g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line + ' ext. ' + extNumber);
		}
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>67848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c746</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Biz Phone With Extension</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_67848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c746</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:db848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c728</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Postalcode on Address Selected</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
* Set Postalcode
*
* http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
* Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
* History
* Updated by Munhwan Gim on 11 June 2018: Initial implementation
**/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
		return;
	}

	var postalCodeCtrlName = 'u_postal_code';
	var _addressTableName = 'x_215090_ocio_madr_ocio_master_address_list_custom_table';
	var streetSelected = newValue;

	g_form.clearValue(postalCodeCtrlName);

	// Execute Script Include to set the Street Options
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIOMasterAddressList');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getPostalcodeByStreet');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_streetVal', streetSelected);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_addressTable', _addressTableName);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(callback);

	function callback(answer) {

		if (answer) {
			console.log('!!!Show Postalcode');
			console.log(answer);

			var postalCode = answer;
			g_form.setValue(postalCodeCtrlName, postalCode);
		}
	}   
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>James.Jose</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-12 17:35:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>361c0697db6213003d1dd001cf96192c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Postalcode on Address Selected</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_361c0697db6213003d1dd001cf96192c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 22:40:57</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Update Contact Information">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:36844e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c7c1</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Fax Number</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Fax Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

	var formControlName = 'u_fax_number';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number';
	var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;

	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';

		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6);
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2f848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c74f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Fax Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2f848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c74f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 17:21:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information 2">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Default Fields From Current User</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Set Default values using the current logged-In User
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 7 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onLoad() {
   
	var userID = g_user.userID;
	var userName = g_user.userName;
	var bizPhoneFieldName = 'phone';
	var oldPhone = g_form.getValue('u_business_phone');
	
	//debugger;
	console.log('User Fullname: ' + g_user.getFullName());
	
	// ToDo. Why gr.get() does not work?
	//var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	//grUser.get(userID);
    //var title = gr.title;
	//console.log('--- Logged In User Title: ' + title);
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	gr.addQuery('sys_id', userID);
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query(recUser);
	
	function recUser(rec){
		
		console.log(rec);
		
		//Must be one record
		while (rec.next()) {
			
			// Is this the correct way?
			var rsCB = rec.recordSet[0];
			g_form.setValue('u_organization', rsCB.company.displayvalue);
		    //var refCompany = g_form.getReference('u_organization', cbSetCompany);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_title', rec.title);
			
			//Special care!
			//g_form.setValue('u_city', rec.location); // reference, dropdownlist
			g_form.setValue('u_address', rec.street); // dropdownlist
			g_form.setValue('u_postal_code', rec.zip);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_business_phone', rec.phone);
			g_form.setValue('u_mobile_phone', rec.mobile_phone);
			
			g_form.setValue('u_department', rec.u_ad_department);
			g_form.setValue('u_office', rec.u_delivery_office);
			
			// Not there yet on sys_user table
			g_form.setValue('u_assistant', rec.u_assitant);
			g_form.setValue('u_fax_number', rec.u_fax);
			g_form.setValue('u_pager', rec.u_pager); 
			g_form.setValue('u_fax_number', rec.u_assitant);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e7848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c762</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Default Fields From Current User</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e7848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c762</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.OCIOMasterAddressList</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>BC Public Service, OCIO. Ajax Server side functions to populate Street per City.</description><name>OCIOMasterAddressList</name><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Server Class for GlideAjax call 
 * 
 * JiRA: BS-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * Last Updated by Munhwan Gim on 9 June 2018
 */
var OCIOMasterAddressList = Class.create();
OCIOMasterAddressList.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	// Return list of street per City by Querying against custom lookup table
	// Input param: city value
	// Custom Table
	getStreets: function() {
	 
		var myUserObject = gs.getUser();		
	    var citySelected = this.getParameter('sysparm_cityVal');
		var addressTableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_addressTable');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord(addressTableName);
		gr.addQuery('u_city', citySelected);
		gr.orderBy('u_sequence');
		gr.query();
		
		var listStates = [];
		while (gr.next()) {
			
		    var streetObj = {};
			streetObj.value = gr.u_street.getDisplayValue();
			streetObj.label = gr.u_street.getDisplayValue();
			streetObj.selected = true;
			
			listStates.push(streetObj);
		}
		
		var response = JSON.stringify(listStates);
		
		return response;
	},
	
	// Return Postal coder based on selected Street by Querying against custom lookup table
	// Input param: street value
	// Custom Table
	getPostalcodeByStreet: function() {
	 
		var myUserObject = gs.getUser();		
	    var streetSelected = this.getParameter('sysparm_streetVal');
		var addressTableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_addressTable');
				
		var gr = new GlideRecord(addressTableName);
		gr.addQuery('u_street', streetSelected);
		gr.query();
		
		var postalCode = '';
		
		while (gr.next()) {
			gs.info(gr.u_postal);
			postalCode = gr.u_postal;
		}
		
		return postalCode;
	},
    type: 'OCIOMasterAddressList'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-08 22:06:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>706326864f2613006e76ff6f9310c778</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OCIOMasterAddressList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_706326864f2613006e76ff6f9310c778</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 22:36:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information 2">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:87844e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c7cc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Validate Mobile Phone Number to the format: ### ###-####
 * A user might type without () for the AREA code, and formatted typed phone number in (###) ###-####.
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 6 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '' || oldValue == newValue) {
		return;
	}

    var formControlName = 'u_mobile_phone';	
	var invalidMsg = 'Please enter 10 digit phone number';
	var phonenoPattern = /^\(?([0-9]{3})\)?[-. ]?([0-9]{3})[-. ]?([0-9]{4})$/;
	
	newValue = newValue.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '');
	var digits = newValue.length;
	if (newValue.match(phonenoPattern))
	{
		var code = '';

		var area = newValue.substring(0, 3);
		var prefix = newValue.substring(3, 6);
		var line = newValue.substring(6);
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, '(' + area + ') ' + prefix + '-' + line);
		g_form.hideFieldMsg(formControlName);	 
	}	
	else
	{
		g_form.setValue(formControlName, oldValue);
		g_form.showFieldMsg(formControlName, invalidMsg, "error");
		return false;
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>27848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c75f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Mobile Phone Number</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_27848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c75f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_6b848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c74c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Update Contact Information 2">f28446834f2613006e76ff6f9310c788</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:cb844e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c7f9</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Populate Street List</name><order/><script><![CDATA[/**
 * Populate the cascaded Street Options against the selected City
 *
 * http://jira.im.gov.bc.ca/browse/SB-155
 * Copyright to BC Public Service, OCIO
 * History
 * Updated by Munhwan Gim on 11 June 2018: Initial implementation
 **/
function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	
	//debugger;
   if (isLoading || newValue == '' || newValue == oldValue) {
      return;
   }
   	
   // ToDo.. Is there any better way to get the custom table name?
   var addressCtrlName = 'u_address';
   var postalCodeCtrlName = 'u_postal_code';
   var _addressTableName = 'x_215090_ocio_madr_ocio_master_address_list_custom_table';
   var citySelected = newValue;
	
   // Clear Street and Postal code
	if (newValue !== oldValue) {
		g_form.clearValue(postalCodeCtrlName);
		g_form.clearOptions(addressCtrlName);
	}

	// Execute Script Include to set the Street Options
	var ga = new GlideAjax('OCIOMasterAddressList');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getStreets');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_cityVal', citySelected);
	ga.addParam('sysparm_addressTable', _addressTableName);
	ga.getXMLAnswer(streetCallback);
	
	function streetCallback(answer) {
				
		if (answer) {
			// Set up Street Datasource
			var objList = JSON.parse(answer);
			var selected = 0;
			
			for (var i = 0; i < objList.length; i++ ) {
				var obj = objList[i];
				g_form.addOption(addressCtrlName, obj.value, obj.label);
				if (obj.selected) {
					selected = i;
				}
			}
			g_form.setValue(addressCtrlName, objList[selected].value, objList[selected].label);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6b848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c74c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Street List</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6b848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c74c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-11 22:22:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2b848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c749</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Pager</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2b848e074f2613006e76ff6f9310c749</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>James.Jose</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-12 17:19:19</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
